Detailed Description

main file for the daqroot executable

daqroot adds the libraries/dictionaries for the EventData, ChannelData, etc classes which are stored in the Events tree, to the ROOT interactive shell. daqroot also adds several utility functions and classes defined in the analysis directory. See the notes in LinkDef.h for how to add classes.

Definition in file daqroot.cc.
